features: Clothes Iron Size: We have upgraded the original mini size. The existing size is about 165 x 95 x 65 mm / 6.49 x 3.74 x 2.6 inches, equivalent to the length of 1 smartphone. This small iron provides 110V designed for the US.After the upgrade, small iron is easy to carry and store, and improves work efficiency, bringing you a lot of convenience; please see the size clearly and place an order according to your needs.

Easy to Operate: After iron for clothes is powered on, irons for ironing clothes is upright, and the ironing can be started when the temperature is suitable. Different gears can be selected according to different objects. Do not unplug the power cord during use. After use, turn off the power and let it cool down naturally.

Practical: Travel Iron Mini is suitable for people who like crafting and DIY, and also for housewives who iron clothes for their families. You can use clothing iron to make all kinds of small things, such as iron beads with name stickers, diamonds, etc. Practical tools can help you achieve this easily.
Great Gift: The small heat press is perfect for craft lovers, students and housewives. You can give it as a gift to your friends, parents to impress them.

Features: The upgraded mini craft iron is easy to carry, the handle is comfortable to hold, and ironing is easy. The shell of heat press is made of resin material, with high strength and good toughness. The heating is made of ceramic material. Irons for quilters can be preheated in 1.5 minutes. Mini iron for sewing can easily meet the ironing needs of different clothes. Long-term power-on does not overheat, use it with confidence.
body.description: Mini Irons for Crafts and Clothing Ideal for Small or Unique Heat Transfer Projects Great for Custom Personalizing T-Shirts, Clothes, Accessories, Hats, Totes, Masks, Pillows, Aprons.Multi Color Small Craft Irons: Pure White, light blue, light pink, black, rose red and purple look beautiful and give you a good visual experience.At the same time, it is easy to heat press, you can store and carry as you want.Adopt 4-level temperature adjustment allows you to easily cope with various ironing needsLightweight and compact, easy to carry. Easy to carry when traveling.Small size, low power consumption, can be used in student dormitories, practical tools.Specification:Condition: 100% Brand NewItem Type: Electric IronSize: Approx. 6.49 x 3.74 x 2.6 inchesUsage: Use with power cord and plugPacking list:1 x Iron1 x 1.5m long power cord plugNote: Due to manual measurement, please allow slight size error. Due to different monitors, please allow slight color difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used this to put edge banding veneer . It worked real well. Heated up great to trigger the adhesive to liquify. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact iron !
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for an iron for craft, work on your clothes with patches, etc, it's what you need.Small but good enough to get the job done.I'd buy it again. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I like this iron because the handle does not get hot and is very lightweight. It did the job I purchased it for.ProsIt only weighs about 9 ounces. Good size for small jobs. I use it for quilting, and it does an excellent job of pressing seamsthe size is 6 inches by 2.5 inches, so you are only ironing the parts you need to iron, like seamsConsThe cord is only 45 inches long, making it difficult for me to work on an ironing board.I had to add an extension cord to use only on my ironing board.You must press harder to get a very flat seam and hold it there for a few seconds.The cord comes out at an odd angle, so you must be careful when putting it down that it will continue to stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little iron that replaced my full size
reviews.reviewText: I bought this small iron for sewing projects and it works so well, I use it for most of ironing needs. The only down side is there is no steam option, so I have to pull out the full size Black & Decker for that. But otherwise it's a great iron that gets very hot. Nice long cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So so, but did the job
reviews.reviewText: This is quite small and I used the highest setting and it still didn't seem all that warm. But it did the job I needed to have done. Small and compact. Easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mini travel iron
reviews.reviewText: This is the best product ever, quality performance and looks.I try to price beat, sometimes it doesn’t pay off, this product is completely worth it, I’m so pleased with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: This iron was a great buy. I purchased it to iron on some patches on my sons hoodie, and boy was i surprised. It works great and gets super hot. This small iron gets hot enough to iron clothes if you needed it. It’s a small and the cord isn’t very long but it does it’s job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So light weight!
reviews.reviewText: The cord is long, making it so convenient to use in my craft room. I just needed to iron the wrinkles out of a scrap of fabric for a small project I was working on, and didn’t want to set up large ironing board, this iron got hot quick!So light weight and was done in a couple of minutes, to set aside to cool! Easy to store in small craft drawer with my other craft tools!
Très étonnant pour le prix et la grosseur! Différents degrés de température, long fils et belle maniabilité. Je l'utilise surtout en couture. Je conseil vivement!
This little iron is amazing. It’s a little power house that I use for my quilting.
Chauffe très rapidement, repasse bien, très contente de mon achat. Idéal pour le voyage. Petit format qui n’encombre pas. Roulette qui s’adapte aux types de tissu.
